prompt: Evaluate the call and determine if a return, replacement or repair are being asked for.

call_id.description: Unique identifier for the call or transcript.

customer_name.description: Name of the customer (individual or company) asking for the return, replacement or repair.

phone_number.description: Phone number of the customer (if provided).

email_address.description: Email address of the customer (if provided).

customer_need.description: What is the customer asking for? (e.g., return, replacement, repair)

timeline.description: Timeline or urgency for getting a replacement or return, as expressed by the customer.

next_steps.description: Action or next steps agreed upon by the agent and prospect (e.g., call for time, deliver it tomorrow).

satisfaction.description: Did the customer seem satisfied with the outcome of the call.

agent_helpful.description: Was the agent understanding and helpful in resolving the customer's issue?

agent_irritated.description: Did the agent seem irritated or frustrated during the call?
